content.question: For which of the following decreasing functions <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> does <math alttext="open parenthesis, f inverse, close parenthesis, prime, of 10, equals negative one eighth" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>10</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>8</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="f of x, equals, negative 5 x, plus 15" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>15</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="f of x, equals, negative 2 times x cubed, minus 2 x, plus 14" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>14</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="f of x, equals, negative, x to the fifth power, minus 4 x, plus 15" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>15</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="f of x, equals, e raised to the negative 2 x power, minus x, plus 9" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="f of x, equals, negative 2 times x cubed, minus 2 x, plus 14" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>14</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

unit.text: 3: Differentiation: Composite, Implicit, and Inverse Functions
